casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2009-2358. Allstate Ins. Co. v. Campbell.

Franklin App. Nos. 09AP-306, 09AP-307, 09AP-308, 09AP-309, 09AP-318, 09AP-319, 09AP-320, and 09AP-321, 2009-Ohio-6055. Reported at_Ohio St.3d_, 2010-Ohio-6312,_N.E.2d__On joint motion for reconsideration or clarification. Motion denied.

Lundberg Stratton and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent. McGee Brown, J., not participating.
